content.html:
AF/MF SETTING (Still Photography)

TOUCH SCREEN MODE


Choose the shooting operations performed using touch controls.

ModeDescription
SHOTTOUCH SHOOTINGTap your subject in the display to focus and release the shutter. In burst mode, pictures will be taken while you keep your finger on the display.
AF ↓↑AFIn focus mode AF-S (SINGLE AF), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current dis- tance until you tap the AF OFF icon. In focus mode AF-C (CONTINUOUS AF), the camera initiates focus when you tap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF OFF icon. In manual focus mode MF (MANUAL FOCUS), you can tap the display to focus on the selected subject using autofocus.
[AF] OFFAF OFF
AREAAREATap to select a point for focus or zoom. The focus frame will move to the selected point.
OFFOFFTouch screen mode off.

The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode.
● To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.


6

The
Shooting
Menus
165
content.markdown:
AF/MF SETTING (Still Photography)

# TOUCH SCREEN MODE

# Choose the shooting operations performed using touch controls.

|  | Mode | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| SHOT | TOUCH SHOOTING | Tap your subject in the display to focus and release the shutter. In burst mode, pictures will be taken while you keep your finger on the display. |
| AF ↓↑ | AF | In focus mode AF-S (SINGLE AF), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current dis- tance until you tap the AF OFF icon. In focus mode AF-C (CONTINUOUS AF), the camera initiates focus when you tap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF OFF icon. In manual focus mode MF (MANUAL FOCUS), you can tap the display to focus on the selected subject using autofocus. |
| [AF] OFF | AF OFF | In focus mode AF-S (SINGLE AF), the camera focuses when you tap your subject in the display. Focus locks at the current dis- tance until you tap the AF OFF icon. In focus mode AF-C (CONTINUOUS AF), the camera initiates focus when you tap your subject display. The camera will continue to adjust focus for changes in the distance to the subject until you tap the AF OFF icon. In manual focus mode MF (MANUAL FOCUS), you can tap the display to focus on the selected subject using autofocus. |
| AREA | AREA | Tap to select a point for focus or zoom. The focus frame will move to the selected point. |
| OFF | OFF | Touch screen mode off. |


The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode.
● To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.

6

The
Shooting
Menus

The behavior of the touch screen varies with the AF mode.
● To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.
